function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Moisture generation due to the use of dbaf.","category":"Air","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reduction in outdoor air supply as a result of dbaf usage.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduced outdoor air requirement from 560 m3 to 119 m3 per hour may impact indoor air quality and increase risk of indoor air pollution.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for indoor air pollution due to reduced outdoor air supply","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High occupancy in office areas can lead to easier transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to natural ventilation due to reduced outdoor air supply","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Different materials used in previous biofiltration system and dbaf may result in different disease transmission and contamination risks","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher face velocity in the current dbaf may lead to increased spread of airborne contaminants and pathogens","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient removal of formaldehyde and toluene due to incorrect bed water content levels","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate performance of the botanical filter for both water soluble and insoluble compounds at extreme bed water content levels","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of the wet film in removing formaldehyde from the air due to improper water content","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High concentrations of formaldehyde and toluene in the built environment","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate outdoor air ventilation","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on specific pollutants for outdoor air ventilation rate determination","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in relative humidity due to operation of dbaf","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in air quality due to sustained voc emissions from furniture systems","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Moisture generation from dbaf leading to increased relative humidity in dry winter climates","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination of indoor air with formaldehyde and toluene","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of additional humidity by the air filtration system","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overserving of air filtration for a smaller space","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term operation of the filter without replacement or maintenance","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contaminant leakage from the chamber or filter system","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient removal of formaldehyde and toluene from the air","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Measurement error in the moisture content readings from the sensors","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate filtration of toluene and formaldehyde due to low bed water content","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Slow decay of emission rate of formaldehyde and toluene","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effect of filter bed on air temperature and rh","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Maximum clean air provided by the dbaf","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of specific chemicals such as formaldehyde and acetaldehyde in the testing process can pose health risks to individuals.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low pollutant concentration due to low emitting materials used","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of toluene as the target voc for study","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continuous monitoring of single pass efficiency until october 2009","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contaminant concentration inside the chamber","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Chamber leakage rate","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of botanical air filtration system into the hvac system","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No clean air supplied to the chamber","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Chamber leakage effect","category":"Air","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Surface adsorption effect","category":"Air","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High air change rate and complete air mixing may lead to rapid spread of contagious diseases if present in the chamber","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Injection of vocs volatile organic compounds like formaldehyde and toluene into the chamber for testing","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in filter bed moisture content levels during tests may impact the efficiency of vocs removal and air quality","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for microbial growth in the root bed due to the presence of microorganisms and organic compounds","category":"Soil","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate moisture control leading to the growth of mold and bacteria in the root bed","category":"Soil","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient airflow and ventilation leading to poor air quality and accumulation of vocs in the indoor environment","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of polluted air into the plant root system","category":"Soil","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term performance of the botanical air filtration system","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential microbial growth related to vocs becoming a carbon source for soil microbial communities in plant rhizosphere","category":"Soil","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate methods for volatile organic compounds vocs removal from indoor air","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of indoor air quality improvement methods","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitation of not measuring viral aerosol particle size directly.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"}]}
